title: Bug 138175 - Bookmark link not saved in Hyperlink Options dialog
description: The bug is related to the saving of bookmark links in the Hyperlink Options dialog.
OB: When reopening the Hyperlink Options dialog, the selected bookmark link is no longer displayed, although it is saved in the XML source.
EB: The expected behavior is that the bookmark link set in a drill-through link should be saved and displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Define a drill-through link with a target bookmark selected.
